name: In An Unknown Ostrichverse
description:
In an unknown ostrichverse is a short adventure game about an ostrich trying to find a cause to their slowly drying river. Collect items, complete quests and find out more about the lore of the world.

This game was made as a student project at SSUD Brno by one person, me to be exact.

Also it's really not well optimized, so you may experience some lag :/
